translations: （使）痛苦；影响；困扰；（天体）相对于……处于应力星位（afflict 的现在分词）
令人痛苦的；使人忧虑的

sentences.sentence: Violent crime is only one of the maladies afflicting modern society.
sentences.translation: 暴力犯罪仅仅是困扰现代社会的严重问题之一。

sentences.sentence: After the thing had closed with a peculiarly afflicting sermon the applause was enthusiastic.
sentences.translation: 在一个特别令人难受的冗长讲话结束后，热烈的掌声响起。

sentences.sentence: OF ALL the blights afflicting the sea, carbon dioxide is just one.
sentences.translation: 在所有正折磨着大海的破坏分子中，二氧化碳只为其一。
